name: LunarProxy
description: I developed a custom proxy solution for a client, enabling them to bypass IP-based restrictions and ensure stable, secure connections for their services. The project involved reverse-engineering private APIs and implementing a robust proxy system.
testimonial: The proxy solution you developed has been a game-changer for our operations. We can now maintain stable connections without worrying about IP blocks. Your expertise in reverse engineering and network protocols is truly impressive.

name: Prim
description: I developed a custom Minecraft plugin for a client that introduced new gameplay mechanics and features. The project involved creating a complex system for managing player data, implementing custom events, and ensuring compatibility with other plugins.
testimonial: The plugin you created for our server has exceeded all our expectations. It's stable, feature-rich, and has significantly improved the player experience. Your attention to detail and commitment to quality are second to none.

name: Sulfurium
description: I provided backend development services for a client's web application, focusing on creating a scalable and efficient infrastructure. The project involved designing and implementing a RESTful API, managing databases, and ensuring data security.
testimonial: Your backend development skills have been invaluable to our project. The API you built is fast, reliable, and secure, and your ability to work with our existing codebase has been a huge help. We couldn't have done it without you.

name: Tobias
description: I developed a custom Discord bot for a client's server, providing a range of features to enhance community engagement. The project involved integrating with third-party APIs, creating custom commands, and ensuring the bot was user-friendly and reliable.
testimonial: The Discord bot you created has been a fantastic addition to our server. It's packed with useful features and has been a great tool for engaging our community. Your creativity and technical skills are top-notch.

name: NotSoBlind
description: I developed a custom screen reader application for a client, designed to assist visually impaired users in navigating digital content. The project involved creating a text-to-speech engine, implementing keyboard shortcuts, and ensuring compatibility with various applications.
testimonial: The screen reader you developed has made a huge difference in my ability to access digital content. It's intuitive, reliable, and has given me a new level of independence. Your work is truly life-changing.

name: Nice
description: I developed a CLI tool that enabled a fellow developer to communicate with his non-verbal brother. I was in charge of the backend logic, which involved serializing and transmitting data to an Arduino device.
testimonial: The CLI tool you developed has been a blessing for my family. It has allowed my brother to communicate with us in ways we never thought possible. Your expertise in hardware integration and backend development is truly remarkable.

name: Zeqer
description: I developed a custom plugin for a client's Minecraft server, which involved creating a unique gameplay experience with custom items, abilities, and bosses. The project required a deep understanding of game mechanics and player behavior.
testimonial: The plugin you created has transformed our server into a truly unique experience. The custom content is engaging, well-balanced, and has been a huge hit with our players. Your passion for game design is evident in every detail.

name: Tomer
description: I developed an automated system for a client that streamlined their workflow and reduced manual labor. The project involved creating a series of scripts that automated data entry, file processing, and report generation.
testimonial: The automation system you built has been a game-changer for our business. It has saved us countless hours of manual work and allowed us to focus on more important tasks. Your problem-solving skills and attention to detail are exceptional.
